mapper.select: SELECT sum(uci.`ios_brokerage_value`) FROM `user_coin_increase` uci JOIN `oe_order_detail` ood ON uci.`order_no_course` = ood.`id` AND ood.`course_id` = #{courseId}
SELECT sum(uci.`ios_brokerage_value`) FROM `user_coin_increase` uci JOIN `oe_gift_statement` ogs ON uci.`order_no_gift` = ogs.`id` AND ogs.`live_id` = #{liveId}
SELECT sum(uci.`ios_brokerage_value`) FROM `user_coin_increase` uci JOIN `oe_gift_statement` ogs ON uci.`order_no_gift` = ogs.`id` AND ogs.`live_id` = #{liveId} AND ogs.`giver` = #{giver}
SELECT SUM(uci.value) FROM `user_coin_increase` uci JOIN `oe_order_detail` ood ON uci.`order_no_course` = ood.`id` AND ood.`course_id` = #{courseId} WHERE uci.`change_type`=7
SELECT SUM(uci.`value`) FROM `user_coin_increase` uci JOIN `oe_gift_statement` ogs ON uci.`order_no_gift` = ogs.id WHERE ogs.`live_id`= #{liveId}
SELECT SUM(ogs.`price`) FROM `oe_gift_statement` ogs WHERE ogs.`live_id` = #{liveId}

SELECT oc.type, ou.`name`, ogs.giver, SUM(ogs.`price`) total, CONCAT(TRUNCATE(uci.`ratio`,2),'%') percent FROM `oe_gift_statement` ogs JOIN `oe_user` ou ON ogs.`giver` = ou.id JOIN `oe_course` oc ON ogs.`live_id` = oc.`id` JOIN `user_coin_increase` uci ON uci.`order_no_gift` = ogs.id WHERE ogs.`live_id` = #{liveId} GROUP BY ou.id ORDER BY total desc

select sum(uci.`value`) from `oe_gift_statement` ogs join `oe_user` ou on ogs.`giver` = ou.id join `user_coin_increase` uci on uci.`order_no_gift` = ogs.id where ogs.`giver`= #{giver} and ogs.`live_id` = #{liveId}
SELECT uci.value FROM `user_coin_increase` uci JOIN `oe_order_detail` ood ON uci.`order_no_course` = ood.`id` AND uci.`id` = #{id} WHERE uci.`change_type`=7
